description.en:
Nobo and Her? by MOLICO ROSS

Invisible but cute? Sweet life with a ghost girlfriend ♥

Rumours are flying around college that Yasuhisa Nobo has a new girlfriend… but no one has ever seen her?! The heart-warming tale of the (for some reason?!) popular Nobo and his invisible ghostly girlfriend♪

From the Editor:
The “ghostly girlfriend” is never drawn anywhere in the manga. Instead, she communicates by writing on a whiteboard, and by moving various objects in the room. It’s amazing how much of her emotions really come across, without ever seeing her! You’ll discover just how cute she is ♥ She only exists in each reader’s imagination, as the ideal girlfriend. Read this once, and you too will fall in love with her too♪

[b][*]Note:[b] [url=https://www.manga-audition.com/comic-zenon/nobo-and-her-by-molico-ross/]Official English[/url] is halted, with latest ch 17 release on 12/25/2016. No announcement plans were made for continuing the English releases.
